alert.note: Alert for Wabasha (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 7:46PM CDT until May 09 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL WABASHA AND NORTHERN BUFFALO COUNTIES... At 745 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Durand, or 10 miles west of Mondovi, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. Around 730 PM, quarter sized hail was reported near Lake City. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Mondovi around 800 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Maxville, The Big Swamp Area, Maple Springs, Misha Mokwa, Urne, County Roads 33 And 4 and Nelson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Minnesota...and west central Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
